intro: Xanthophyllum incertum, commonly known as the uncertain yellow-flowered plant, is a species native to tropical regions of South America. It is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features yellow-orange flowers arranged in dense, spherical inflorescences, which are typical of the genus Xanthophyllum. Its leaves are usually lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, contributing to its unique botanical appearance. Xanthophyllum incertum is primarily valued for its ornamental appeal and is often cultivated in botanical gardens.
